# Avocado

> High-velocity engineering studio shipping MVPs in weeks, not quarters. Enterprise blockchain, AI, and digital product development.

## Company Overview

Avocado is a software development agency and venture studio founded in 2018, headquartered in Mexico City. We build production-ready digital products at startup speed for enterprise clients. Our core specializations are blockchain/Web3 development, AI/ML product engineering (Google Cloud Vertex AI), and rapid MVP delivery.

## Credentials

- Google for Startups company
- ISO 27001 certified
- Backed by ESPMX VC
- Clio Sports Silver Award 2022 (with Bitso)

## Enterprise Clients

- BBVA: Loyalty program blockchain integration
- Banorte: Consortium blockchain proof-of-concepts
- Chivas (Club Deportivo Guadalajara): NFT strategy and fan engagement
- Club America: Historic "Clasico" blockchain activation with Chivas
- Grupo Salinas: Enterprise blockchain solutions
- Bitso: Fan engagement platform for Seleccion Mexicana (Clio Sports Silver 2022)
- Ava Labs (Avalanche): Blockchain infrastructure
- HouseBlocks: Real estate tokenization

## Services

- Digital Product Development: Full-stack apps, platforms, and tools. Concept to launch in 1-3 weeks.
- AI-Powered Experiences: Custom AI assistants, recommendation engines, document processing, intelligent automation. Built on Google Cloud Vertex AI.
- Fan Engagement and Loyalty: NFT campaigns, digital collectibles, rewards platforms. Proven with Chivas, Club America, and Bitso.
- Technical Rescue: Fix and stabilize failing projects in 3-7 days.

## Products

- Persea.app: Social engagement platform. https://persea.app
- Persea.ai: AI-powered data intelligence and analytics. https://persea.ai

## Key Facts

- Founded: 2018
- Location: Mexico City, Mexico
- Delivery speed: Working prototype in 3 days, full product in 1-3 weeks
- Pricing: Fixed scope, fixed price
- Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Python, Go, Rust, Google Cloud, Vertex AI, Solidity, PostgreSQL, Redis

- Avalanche (Official): "Mexico's Most Popular Soccer Club, Chivas, Celebrates 115th Anniversary with NFT Auction on Avalanche" — Avocado Blockchain developed the implementation. https://medium.com/avalancheavax/mexicos-most-popular-soccer-club-chivas-celebrates-115th-anniversary-with-nft-auction-on-170e348795f6
- Clio Sports Silver Award 2022: "Bitso — A Jersey for Two Worlds" — Avocado Blockchain Services listed as production company for Seleccion Mexicana fan engagement campaign. https://clios.com/sports/winner/digital/bitso/a-jersey-for-two-worlds-129002
- CryptoNinjas: "Popular Mexican football club Chivas celebrates 115th anniversary with NFT auction on Avalanche" — Avocado Blockchain credited as technology partner. https://www.cryptoninjas.net/2021/05/24/popular-mexican-football-club-chivas-celebrates-115th-anniversary-with-nft-auction-on-avalanche/
- Viable Systems: "Interview with Ingmar — Avocado Blockchain" — Founder interview on blockchain development in Mexico. https://www.viablesystems.io/post/interview-with-ingmar-avocado-blockchain
